name: ineqan12d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))

stmt.origin: syl2an(w0, w1, wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wceq(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
-| wi(w1, wceq(c1, c3))

comment: Equality deduction for intersection of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2007.)
